greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest cube divisible by n.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = n * A048798(n). [From _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Apr 08 2009]
mathematica: a[n_] := For[k = 1, True, k++, If[ Divisible[c = k^3, n], Return[c]]]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 44}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 03 2012 *)
f[p_, e_] := p^(e + Mod[3 - e, 3]); a[n_] := Times @@ (f @@@ FactorInteger[n]); Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Aug 29 2019 *)
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 28 2000
